Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
The class GameManager manages the games of the server, its role is to associate all the classes of the Observer pattern and to create the game with specific number of players and rules and add players to them

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(Connection c, AddMeMessage message)
      The method JoinLobby take the connection and the AddMeMessage sent by a player and add the player to the right game
      Parameters:
      c - is the connection of the player that want to join a game
      message - is the AddMeMessage sent by a player

    • searchGameByNickname

      public Controller searchGameByNickname(String nickname)
      This method search a game given the nickname of one of the player joined in that game
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the player inside the game that must be searched
      Returns:
      the Controller object of the game

    • removeFinishedGame

      public void removeFinishedGame(Controller controller, boolean resetPlayers)
      This method remove a game that finished
      Parameters:
      controller - is the controller to remove from the list of active games
      resetPlayers - is a boolean to decide if reset the players
